name: Plexyfin
overview: Plugin for Jellyfin that syncs collections and artwork from Plex to Jellyfin
description: Syncs collections, artwork, and their metadata from your Plex Media Server to Jellyfin.
changelog:
- Fix compatibility with Jellyfin 10.11 by using compatibility helper for GetItemList/GetItemsResult API
- Fix TV show episode poster sync for Jellyfin 10.11+
- Add diagnostic logging for version info, configuration, and compatibility method detection
- Add retry logic with exponential backoff for file locking issues during collection sync
